import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import { useDeleteEmployeesMutation } from "../../redux/services/DZapi"; function Table({ getallemployes, openPopup, setShow, refetch }) { const [showUserDrop, setShowUserDrop] = useState(false); const userDropRef = useRef(null); const [nameFilter, setNameFilter] = useState(""); const [deleteEmployees] = useDeleteEmployeesMutation(); const handleDeleteEmployee = async (employeeId) => { try { await deleteEmployees(employeeId); refetch(); } catch (error) {} }; const filteredUsers = getallemployes?.filter((adata) => { const data = adata?.attributes; return data?.name.toLowerCase().includes(nameFilter.toLowerCase()); }); useEffect(() => { const handleClickOutside = (event) => { if (userDropRef.current && !userDropRef.current.contains(event.target)) { setShowUserDrop(false); setShowLanDrop(false); } }; }) const toggleUserDrop = () => { setShowUserDrop(!showUserDrop); }; return ( <>
